title: Self-Directed Foreign Language Learning Program Using Mobile Apps

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Foreign Language Vocabulary and Expressions
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction and personalized learning environments via personal devices, with project-based assessments measuring language proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can acquire and apply over 50 practical foreign language vocabulary items per week via a mobile app.
Learners can construct natural foreign language conversational sentences for over three minutes using in-app dialogue simulations.
Learners can create science-themed projects (e.g., environmental reports) in a foreign language through digital portfolios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
